exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png" fillMode="clip"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xff0202" text=""/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" fillMode="clip" width="40" height="40" source=""/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma" width="100" height="100"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RollAxisSkin" width="144" height="568" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="p0" x="0" y="0" height="138" width="138" source="p4_png"/>
	<e:Image id="p1" source="p2_png" y="142" x="0"/>
	<e:Image id="p2" source="p4_png" y="284" x="1" width="138" height="138"/>
	<e:Image id="test" source="p3_png" x="-66" y="214" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="StartButtonSkin" width="83" height="83" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="button" source="button1_png" x="0" y="0" scaleX="0.2" scaleY="0.2"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="64">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png" visible="false"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0x000000" anchorOffsetY="0" x="0" y="0"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay"
	                textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="297" height="33" size="25"  text="5" verticalCenter="0.5" x="2.5" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" textColor="0xffffff"/>
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay"
	                width="240" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" text="" fontFamily="Microsoft JhengHei" textColor="0xffffff" anchorOffsetX="0" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="696" height="366" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<w:Config id="17cab38c222"/>
	<e:Image source="M2_png" x="-67" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label id="Money" text="1000" x="46" y="110" textColor="0xaa7711" anchorOffsetX="0" width="104" anchorOffsetY="0" height="37" size="30" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label text="剩餘額度" x="46" y="86" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="24" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label text="每次10點，中獎加100點" x="46" y="7" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="24" locked="true"/>
	<ns1:StartButton id="startButton" width="97" height="87" x="599" y="194" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" skinName="StartButtonSkin"/>
	<e:Group id="Axis_0" width="140" height="144" x="77" y="165" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" locked="true">
		<ns1:RollAxis id="rollAxis_0" width="144" height="568" x="-1.9899999999999949" y="-282.02" skinName="RollAxisSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" locked="true"/>
		<e:Rect id="shapeMask0" width="141" height="146" x="1" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillAlpha="1" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" locked="true"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="Axis_1" width="140" height="144" x="242" y="165" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" locked="true">
		<ns1:RollAxis id="rollAxis_1" width="144" height="568" x="-1.9899999999999949" y="-282.02" skinName="RollAxisSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" locked="true"/>
		<e:Rect id="shapeMask1" width="141" height="146" x="1" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillAlpha="1" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" locked="true"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="Axis_2" width="140" height="144" x="408.01" y="165" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" locked="true">
		<ns1:RollAxis id="rollAxis_2" width="144" height="568" x="-1.9899999999999949" y="-282.02" skinName="RollAxisSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" locked="true"/>
		<e:Rect id="shapeMask2" width="141" height="146" x="1" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillAlpha="1" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" locked="true"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:EditableText id="cheatInput" width="100" height="38" text="" x="696" y="-1" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="100"/>
</e:Skin>
